name: R4B-Device-R5-Device
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Device into FHIR R5

target.comment: R4B `Device` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device`
R4B `Device.contact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.contact`
R4B `Device.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.contained`

element.display: The reference to the definition for the device

target.display: The reference to the definition for the device
target.comment: R4B `Device.definition` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Device.definition` - definition has change due to type change: R4B definition Reference has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 definition

element.display: The name of the device as given by the manufacturer
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The name that identifies the device
udi-label-name | user-friendly-name | patient-reported-name | manufacturer-name | model-name | other
Date and time of expiry of this device (if applicable)

target.display: Date and time of expiry of this device (if applicable)
target.comment: R4B `Device.expirationDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.expirationDate`
R4B `Device.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Device.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.id`
R4B `Device.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Device.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.implicitRules`
R4B `Device.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Device.location` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.location`
R4B `Device.lotNumber` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.lotNumber`

element.display: Date when the device was made

target.display: Date when the device was made
target.comment: R4B `Device.manufactureDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.manufactureDate`
R4B `Device.manufacturer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.manufacturer`
R4B `Device.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.meta`

element.display: The manufacturer's model number for the device

target.display: The manufacturer's model number for the device
target.comment: R4B `Device.modelNumber` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.modelNumber`

R4B `Device.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Device.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Device.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`
R4B `Device.owner` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.owner`

element.display: The device that this device is attached to or is part of

target.display: The higher level or encompassing device that this device is a logical part of
target.comment: R4B `Device.parent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.parent`

element.display: The part number or catalog number of the device

target.display: The part number or catalog number of the device
target.comment: R4B `Device.partNumber` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.partNumber`

element.display: Patient to whom Device is affixed
The actual configuration settings of a device as it actually operates, e.g., regulation status, time properties

target.display: Inherent, essentially fixed, characteristics of the device.  e.g., time properties, size, material, etc.
target.comment: R4B `Device.property` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.property`
R4B `Device.property.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.property.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Device.property.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.property.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Device.property.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.property.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Code that specifies the property DeviceDefinitionPropetyCode (Extensible)

target.display: Code that specifies the property being represented
target.comment: R4B `Device.property.type` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.property.type` - type added a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-property-type

element.display: Property value as a code, e.g., NTP4 (synced to NTP)

target.comment: R4B `Device.safety` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.safety` - safety added a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-safety

element.display: Serial number assigned by the manufacturer

target.display: Serial number assigned by the manufacturer
target.comment: R4B `Device.serialNumber` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.serialNumber`

element.display: The capabilities supported on a  device, the standards to which the device conforms for a particular purpose, and used for the communication
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The standard that is used to operate and communicate
The version of the standard that is used to operate and communicate

target.comment: R4B `Device.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: online | paused | standby | offline | not-ready | transduc-discon | hw-discon | off
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Device.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.text`

element.display: The kind or type of device

target.display: The kind or type of device
target.comment: R4B `Device.type` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.type` - type changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)
R4B `Device.udiCarrier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.udiCarrier`
R4B `Device.udiCarrier.carrierAIDC` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.carrierAIDC`
R4B `Device.udiCarrier.carrierHRF` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.carrierHRF`

R4B `Device.udiCarrier.deviceIdentifier` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.deviceIdentifier` - deviceIdentifier made the element mandatory; deviceIdentifier increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1

target.display: barcode | rfid | manual | card | self-reported | electronic-transmission | unknown
target.comment: R4B `Device.udiCarrier.entryType` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.entryType` - entryType has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/udi-entry-type|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/udi-entry-type|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `Device.udiCarrier.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Device.udiCarrier.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.id`
R4B `Device.udiCarrier.issuer` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.issuer` - issuer made the element mandatory; issuer increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1
R4B `Device.udiCarrier.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.jurisdiction`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Device.udiCarrier.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.udiCarrier.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Device.url` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.url`

element.display: The actual design of the device or software version running on the device

target.display: The actual design of the device or software version running on the device
target.comment: R4B `Device.version` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.version`

element.display: A single component of the device version

target.display: The hardware or software module of the device to which the version applies
target.comment: R4B `Device.version.component` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.version.component`
R4B `Device.version.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.version.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Device.version.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.version.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Device.version.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.version.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The type of the device version, e.g. manufacturer, approved, internal

target.display: The type of the device version, e.g. manufacturer, approved, internal
target.comment: R4B `Device.version.type` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Device.version.type` - type added a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-versiontype
R4B `Device.version.value` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Device.version.value`
